categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back actors

nodes.text: Michael Pangrazio is an artist who provided a number of matte paintings used in Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back and Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi, and was credited as matte painting supervisor for the latter film. His extensive list of film credits include Caravan of Courage: An Ewok Adventure, as well as Lucasfilm's Raiders of the Lost Ark and Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom. Some of his art later appeared in The Illustrated Star Wars Universe.
Pangrazio very briefly appeared as an extra in The Empire Strikes Back, portraying a Rebel pilot. His character later appeared in the Star Wars Customizable Card Game and was named Tarn Mison.
